text: Singapore Art Museum (also known as SAM to most Singaporeans) is the first museum in Singapore. It was opened in 1996. The museum showcases contemporary art from Singapore, Southeast Asia (SEA), and Asia. Before it was a museum, it was a boys' school. ==References== Category:Art museums Category:Buildings and structures in Singapore Category:1996 establishments in Asia Category:20th- century establishments in Singapore Category:Singaporean culture Category:Organizations based in Singapore
title: Singapore Art Museum
